goals.result: Sorry, you were not selected as the National Conference of State Legislatures 'Outstanding Legislatorof the Year' award but your application and effort was appreciated.
You are about 'average' when it comes to respect from your colleagues.
Your family relations couldn't be worse.  You were caught in Motel Six with an exotic dancer from the 'Boom Boom' room.  A divorce is likely.

body.p2: You did a great job representing the major interests in your district.  This helped you in your request for re-election.
body.p3: You were about average in getting ready for your campaign.
body.p4: You ignored the interests of the business community, hurting your chances of raising money for your campaign.
body.p5: Your staff left you during the last year.  It hurt your chances of getting re-elected.
body.p6: You ignored the Governor and his agenda.  This hurt you some in fundraising but not much in the election.
body.p7: You were ethical enough to avoid problems but not in the upper 75%.
body.p8: You did an outstanding job in raising money for the campaign without being unethical.
body.p9: You did a good job in spending more than 80% of your funds in direct voter contact.
